alert.note: Alert for Box Elder; Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 4:00PM MDT until September 03 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Box Elder County in northern Utah... North central Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 445 PM MDT * At 359 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 22 miles east of Montello to 9 miles southeast of Utah Test and Training Range North, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet observed. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Gunnison Island and Lakeside. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 17 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
